name: mnemonic-client
description: Thin client for mnemonic - persistent memory for agents

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build ../../src/client.ts --outdir dist --format esm --external effect --external '@effect/platform' --external '@effect/platform/*' && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist --moduleResolution bundler --module ESNext --target ES2020 --strict --skipLibCheck ../../src/client.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run lint && bun run test && bun run build
